title: Rams-Cardinals Recap and Gifts for Each Other
itunes:title: Rams-Cardinals Recap and Gifts for Each Other
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal recap the division matchup between the Cardinals and Rams Monday night bash and then give each other gifts for the holiday season (Not all of them are nice). Colleen Wolfe joins to give a gift of her own and preview the TNF Chiefs- Chargers game in Los Angeles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
